welcome:
Hello! Soft Reminder is a bot that serves as your personal assistant for managing significant events. It's crafted to store crucial dates and occasions, ensuring you never miss out by providing timely reminders.
Use /help to see the list of commands.
help:
Here is how can you use the bot:
/help - provides a list of commands
/clear - clears all excisting events
/add - adds new event
/today - lists all today's events
/tomorrow - lists all tomorrow's events
/upcoming - lists all upcoming events
/delete - deletes an event
